body_html:
At the moment, we use cmake to build all of our TF code on windows GPU.
Bazel is not very well tested, but we are working hard to make bazel fully work on windows.
@meteorcloudy may have some ideas about the messages you see. It may be as simple as needing a different --config value in your bazel command.

Your logs have these messages, which look suspicious to me:

LINK : warning LNK4044: unrecognized option '/Wl,-rpath,../local_config_cuda/cuda/lib64'; ignored
LINK : warning LNK4044: unrecognized option '/Wl,-rpath,../local_config_cuda/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64'; ignored
.....
cl : Command line warning D9024 : unrecognized source file type 'cuda', object file assumed

@meteorcloudy could you comment?

body:
At the moment, we use cmake to build all of our TF code on windows GPU.
Bazel is not very well tested, but we are working hard to make bazel fully work on windows.
@meteorcloudy may have some ideas about the messages you see. It may be as simple as needing  a different `--config` value in your bazel command.

Your logs have these messages, which look suspicious to me:
```
LINK : warning LNK4044: unrecognized option '/Wl,-rpath,../local_config_cuda/cuda/lib64'; ignored
LINK : warning LNK4044: unrecognized option '/Wl,-rpath,../local_config_cuda/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64'; ignored
.....
cl : Command line warning D9024 : unrecognized source file type 'cuda', object file assumed
```

@meteorcloudy could you comment?
